atk-s0517a10:2_0: 237. Idāni tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vipallāsānaṁ pahānakaraṁ ariyamaggaṁ dassentena kathitāya
atk-s0517a10:2_1: maggakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā. Tattha maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggoti yo buddhasāsane
atk-s0517a10:2_2: maggoti vuccati, so kenaṭṭhena maggo nāma hotīti attho. Micchādiṭṭhiyā pahānāyātiādīsu
atk-s0517a10:2_3: dasasu pariyāyesu paṭhamo paṭhamo tassa tassa maggaṅgassa ujuvipaccanīkavasena vutto.
atk-s0517a10:2_4: Maggo ceva hetu cāti tassa tassa kiccassa karaṇāya paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo, sampāpakaṭṭhena
atk-s0517a10:2_5: hetu. Tena maggassa paṭipadaṭṭho sampāpakaṭṭho ca vutto hoti. ‘‘Ayaṁ maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā’’tiādīsu
atk-s0517a10:2_6: (saṁ. ni. 5.5, 48) hi paṭipadā maggo, ‘‘maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetuṭṭho’’tiādīsu (paṭi.
atk-s0517a10:2_7: ma. 2.8) sampāpako hetu. Evaṁ dvīhi dvīhi padehi ‘‘maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo’’ti pucchāya
atk-s0517a10:2_8: vissajjanaṁ kataṁ hoti. Sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāyāti attanā sahajātānaṁ
atk-s0517a10:2_11: ettha yasmā ‘‘ko cādi kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, sīlañca suvisuddhaṁ diṭṭhi ca ujukā’’ti
atk-s0517a10:2_12: (saṁ. ni. 5.369, 381) vacanato sīlañca diṭṭhi ca saccapaṭivedhassa ādi. So ca ādimaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0517a10:2_13: visujjhati. Tasmā ‘‘paṭivedhādivisodhanāyā’’ti vuttaṁ. Cittassa adhiṭṭhānāyāti sampayuttacittassa
atk-s0517a10:2_14: sakakicce patiṭṭhānāya. Cittassa vodānāyāti cittassa parisuddhabhāvāya. Visesādhigamāyāti
atk-s0517a10:2_15: lokiyato visesapaṭilābhāya. Uttari paṭivedhāyāti lokiyato uttari paṭivijjhanatthāya.
atk-s0517a10:2_16: Saccābhisamayāyāti catunnaṁ saccānaṁ ekābhisamayāya kiccanipphattivasena ekapaṭivedhāya.
atk-s0517a10:2_17: Nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāyāti cittassa vā puggalassa vā nibbāne patiṭṭhāpanatthāya. Sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇādīsu
atk-s0517a10:2_18: aṭṭha maggaṅgāni ekato katvā taṁtaṁmaggavajjhakilesappahānaṁ vuttaṁ. Evaṁ vacane
atk-s0517a10:2_19: kāraṇaṁ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Yasmā uparūparimaggenāpi suṭṭhu ādivisodhanā suṭṭhu cittavodānañca
atk-s0517a10:3_0: Dassanamaggotiādīhi yāva pariyosānā tassa dhammassa lakkhaṇavasena maggaṭṭho vutto.
atk-s0517a10:3_1: Tāni sabbānipi padāni abhiññeyyaniddese vuttatthāneva. Evamettha yathāsambhavaṁ lokiyalokuttaro
atk-s0517a10:3_2: maggo niddiṭṭho. Hetuṭṭhena maggoti ca aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo niddiṭṭho. Nippariyāyamaggattā
atk-s0517a10:3_3: cassa puna ‘‘maggo’’ti na vuttaṁ. Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyāti ādīni ca indriyādīnaṁ
atk-s0517a10:3_4: atthavasena vuttāni, na maggaṭṭhavasena. Saccānīti cettha saccañāṇāni. Sabbepi te
atk-s0517a10:3_5: dhammā nibbānassa paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo. Ante vuttaṁ nibbānaṁ pana saṁsāradukkhābhibhūtehi
atk-s0517a10:3_6: dukkhanissaraṇatthikehi sappurisehi maggīyati gavesīyatīti maggoti vuttanti veditabbanti.
